nodes.text: Krussk was a male Trandoshan commander serving in the Trandoshan Pirates who led a group of fellow Trandoshan pirates in overtaking Bunker Krill during the Battle of Umbara.

Krussk, with his pirate band, attacked and partially overtook Bunker Krill owned by the Umbaran militia and their Confederacy of Independent Systems allies during the Republic invasion of Umbara. He held his position there until a Jedi Knight arrived and cleared the bunker of both the Trandoshan and Separatist forces.
